info.title: Loyalty Platform API
info.description: A Loyalty **Programme** encourages **Members** to shop at **Outlets** owned/run by **Participants**, by offering those **Members** some incentives such as **Vouchers** or amounts of **Currencies** in return for their **Purchases**. The **Loyalty Platform** exposes **Resources** that are used to construct and manage loyalty **Programmes**.

parameters.name: _embed
parameters.description: Include embedded full associated resource description(s) for: members, tokens, memberships

parameters.name: _reference
parameters.description: Include embedded UUIDs of associated resource description(s) for: members, tokens, memberships

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: List start offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Valid values: created_at

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Valid values depend on 'sort': created_at => desc, asc

default.description: Error conditions are described in the Loyalty Platform API

parameters.name: _embed
parameters.description: Include embedded full associated resource description(s) for: members, tokens, memberships

parameters.name: _reference
parameters.description: Include embedded UUIDs of associated resource description(s) for: members, tokens, memberships

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: UUID of instance. Some endpoints support other IDs here; see full API documentation for details.

default.description: Error conditions are described in the Loyalty Platform API

parameters.description: Include embedded full associated resource description(s) for: members, tokens, memberships

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: UUID of instance. Some endpoints support other IDs here; see full API documentation for details.

default.description: Error conditions are described in the Loyalty Platform API

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: List start offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Valid values: created_at

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Valid values depend on 'sort': created_at => desc, asc

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Include items matching URL-encoded values of 'field=search-string'; search on: token_identifier, member_id, dest_currency_code

default.description: Error conditions are described in the Loyalty Platform API

parameters.name: _reference
parameters.description: Include embedded UUIDs of associated resource description(s) for: account, member, memberships

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: List start offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Valid values: created_at

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Valid values depend on 'sort': created_at => desc, asc

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Include items matching URL-encoded values of 'field=search-string'; search on: member_id, account_id

default.description: Error conditions are described in the Loyalty Platform API
